attributes.action: Ensure English and Welsh Nurses get treat on an equal footing with Scottish Nurses on future pay awards.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently Scottish Nurses have had their national pay deal overturned by the Scottish parliament, so that now, unlike their English and Welsh counterparts, they will get their pay award all at once.  This could create resentment and division within the profession.
